analysis.description:
MiniMeToken.balances (/unique_chucks/13/0xb5954a97ef2258c25809e7a26a6fe18d5e64d25f.sol#119-120) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- doTransfer (/unique_chucks/13/0xb5954a97ef2258c25809e7a26a6fe18d5e64d25f.sol#216-245)
	- balanceOfAt (/unique_chucks/13/0xb5954a97ef2258c25809e7a26a6fe18d5e64d25f.sol#323-344)
	- generateTokens (/unique_chucks/13/0xb5954a97ef2258c25809e7a26a6fe18d5e64d25f.sol#415-429)
	- destroyTokens (/unique_chucks/13/0xb5954a97ef2258c25809e7a26a6fe18d5e64d25f.sol#432-449)
MiniMeToken.isContract (/unique_chucks/13/0xb5954a97ef2258c25809e7a26a6fe18d5e64d25f.sol#516-520) is declared view but contains assembly code

Reentrancy in MiniMeToken.approve (/unique_chucks/13/0xb5954a97ef2258c25809e7a26a6fe18d5e64d25f.sol#258-277):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(ITokenController(controller).onApprove(msg.sender,_spender,_amount) == true) (/unique_chucks/13/0xb5954a97ef2258c25809e7a26a6fe18d5e64d25f.sol#274-275)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- allowed (/unique_chucks/13/0xb5954a97ef2258c25809e7a26a6fe18d5e64d25f.sol#276)

MiniMeToken.claimTokens (/unique_chucks/13/0xb5954a97ef2258c25809e7a26a6fe18d5e64d25f.sol#548-563) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(controller,balance) (/unique_chucks/13/0xb5954a97ef2258c25809e7a26a6fe18d5e64d25f.sol#560-563)

MiniMeToken.getValueAt.min (local variable @ /unique_chucks/13/0xb5954a97ef2258c25809e7a26a6fe18d5e64d25f.sol#482) shadows:
	- MiniMeToken.min (function @ /unique_chucks/13/0xb5954a97ef2258c25809e7a26a6fe18d5e64d25f.sol#521-525)

MiniMeToken.isContract uses assembly (/unique_chucks/13/0xb5954a97ef2258c25809e7a26a6fe18d5e64d25f.sol#516-520)
	- /unique_chucks/13/0xb5954a97ef2258c25809e7a26a6fe18d5e64d25f.sol#518-520
MiniMeToken.version should be constant (/unique_chucks/13/0xb5954a97ef2258c25809e7a26a6fe18d5e64d25f.sol#91)
Controlled.changeController (/unique_chucks/13/0xb5954a97ef2258c25809e7a26a6fe18d5e64d25f.sol#66-72) should be declared external
ApproveAndCallFallBack.receiveApproval (/unique_chucks/13/0xb5954a97ef2258c25809e7a26a6fe18d5e64d25f.sol#74-80) should be declared external
MiniMeToken.transfer (/unique_chucks/13/0xb5954a97ef2258c25809e7a26a6fe18d5e64d25f.sol#182-184) should be declared external
